definition[0]: if you put money in or into a business, a particular activity etc, you invest it there
example[0]: Daewoo wanted GM to expand the joint-venture car plant. The plan called for each company to put in $100 million.
definition[1]: if you put money in or into a bank, you leave money in an account there
example[1]: Why invest in stocks, which can be dangerous, when you can put money in a bank without any risk?
example[2]: small investors who put their money into building society savings accounts
